name: The Fabulous
title: thefabulous.co
shortDescription: The Fabulous is a digital coach that helps users establish and maintain healthy habits through structured routines and expert coaching. It's designed for individuals looking to improve their productivity and well-being. Users can access a variety of tools such as a coaching library, personal coaching sessions, and community support to enhance their daily life and achieve personal goals.
cons: May require subscription for full features
Potential dependency on app for routine

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Headspace
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on meditation for habit improvement
